description:
Transnational Company Global Leader in Marketing and Distribution of Food Supplements requests: Network Engineer

The Network Engineer is responsible for designing, testing, implementing, and supporting network infrastructure. This role provides consultation and direct technical support in life cycle planning, problem management, integration, and network configuration

 

Skill

       ·         Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.

·        Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.

·        6+ years network engineering.

·        Experienced in providing third tier and on-going technical support for all LAN/WAN related operations.

·        Experience with network monitoring tools (SolarWinds, HP Network Automation, Cisco Prime, Infoblox, Wireshark)

·        Proven ability to design, implement, maintain, and support local and remote portions of a global enterprise network.

·        Ability to conduct network security assessments such as creating and maintaining detailed project plans, scope of work, and other technical documentation of all moves, adds, and changes regarding WAN

·        Basic knowledge of ITIL and Service Management Principles.

·         Hands-on knowledge of configuration and maintenance of networking equipment: Cisco routers (ISR Gen 2 & 3), Cisco Catalyst (4500 series), Cisco Switches (Catalyst 9000 series and Nexus 7k and 9k), Cisco Firewalls (ASA & FirePower); Citrix load balancers, ACS & ISE, FirePower IDS/IPS, VoIP, and Wireless Access Points & Controller

·           Good knowledge of TCP/IP Protocol suite, IP routing protocols, IPSEC VPN, and xDSL Technologies, OSI Model and Layered Troubleshooting.


Preferred

·        Certificates preferred: CCNA, CCNP or equivalent


Responsabilities

·        ·         The Network Engineer is responsible for designing, testing, implementing, and supporting network infrastructure. This role provides consultation and direct technical support in life cycle planning, problem management, integration, and network configuration.

·        ·         Maximizing network performance by monitoring performance, troubleshooting network problems and outages, scheduling upgrades and collaborating with network architects on network optimization.

·         ·         Experienced in providing third tier and on-going technical support for all LAN/WAN related operations.

·        ·         Ability to evaluate existing communications systems, identify deficiencies, and make network performance recommendations

 

Send CV in PDF format in English to the email address specified in contact information in the name of the position as title, otherwise it will not be taken in consideration

En Praxis estamos en búsqueda del mejor talento...



DESARROLLADOR JAVA



ZONA DE TRABAJO:

Colonia Juárez, CDMX

Licenciatura en Sistemas, Computación o carrera afín

  • Gestores de Bases de Datos.

Ingles avanzado

Si estas interesado manda el CV a l correo mencionado con asunto " Desarrollador Java "



"En Praxis queda prohibido la solicitud de certificados médicos de no embarazo y virus de inmunodeficiencia humana (VIH) como requisito p a ra ingreso, pe r manencia o ascenso"

Role/ Responsibilities:

• Assist in design and development of Android application

• Influencing peers, juniors and seniors both within the organization and across

• Native Android app development and converting ideas, designs and requirements to concrete

stable production builds

• Coordinate and collaborate with the Product and Engineering teams to understand problems, come

up with creative solutions, and help with tracking and delivering within the release plan

• Understand and implement Android specific design patterns

• Collaborate with Engineering and QA to resolve bugs

Desired Skills and Experience:

• At least 3 years of native Android development experience . 6 years total experience

• Extremely comfortable with understanding and implementing internet application with REST services at the backend

• Super awesome with Android concepts like fragments, location services, Google Cloud Messaging API, UI transitions, Image processing and multi threaded communications, among others

• Familiarity with continuous integration (Jenkins), application monitoring (Crashlytics and fabric.io), mocking tools (Appium and Apiary), build tool development and enhancements, using unit testing and cucumber tests for functional tests

• Extremely comfortable with understanding and implementing client-side handlers for web services with REST services at the backend

• Knowledge in Android Studio and GitHub is a huge plus

- Experience with Cucumber testing framework desired

• B.S. or equivalent degree in Computer Science is desired

DARE TO BE A PART OF THE CHALLENGE! COME AND JOIN OUR TEAM TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE THE DIFFERENCE!

Did you know that Accenture is leading the digital transformation in the World?

Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services and solutions in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. Our main purpose is to collaborate with our clients, so they can become high-performance businesses. Accenture is present in more than 200 offices, 120 cities, 56 countries and approximately 390,000 employees worldwide.

Career Plan:   

·       Career development according to your profile and interests.

·       Work in one of the best companies and feel proud.

·       Access to an innovative methodology and tools.

·       Direct contact with experts worldwide.

·       Use of work schemes and cutting-edge technologies.

·       Constant training.

·       Work environment based on teamwork and collaboration.

·       Participation in International Projects

 

Qualifications for the position:

·        AWS Certified Cloud Engineer  

with around 3+ Years of experience overall and 1+ Years of experience in AWS

·       Experienced in Automating, Configuring and deploying instances on AWS (or other) environments and Data centers, also familiar with EC2, Cloud watch, Cloud Formation and managing security groups on AWS.

·       Private Cloud Environment - Leveraging AWS and Chef/Puppet/Terraform to provision internal computer systems.

·       Application Amazon Machine Images (“AMI”) development.

·       AWS Identity and Access Management implementation

·       Develop automation components for installation and configuration of software for applications/blueprints.

·       Wrote python scripts to manage AWS resources also worked with AWS CLI.

·       Wrote playbooks to launch AWS instances to manage web applications, configuration files, used mount points and packages.

·       Maintenance and Vulnerability Management and CI/CD using tools like Chef.

·       Experience with automation tools like Chef to manage AWS for EC2/S3/Route53 & ELB, etc.

·       Experience in developing and maintaining build, deployment scripts for test, Staging and Production environments using ANT, Maven, Shell and Perl Scripts.

·       Maintained high Availability clustered and standalone server environments and refined automation component with scripting and configuration management.

·       Experience in automating Vulnerability Management patching and CI/CD using Chef and other tools like GitLab, Jenkins, and AWS.

·       Knowledge of AWS cloud service like Compute, Network, Storage and Identity & access management.

·       Hands-on Experience in configuration of Network architecture on AWS with VPC, Subnets, Internet gateway, NAT, Route table.

·       Responsible for ensuring Systems & Network Security, maintaining performance and setting up monitoring using Cloud Watch or Nagios.

·       Experience in working on version controller tools like GitHub (GIT), Subversion (SVN) and software builds tools like Apache Maven, Apache Ant.

·       Worked on CI/CD pipeline for code deployment by engaging different tools (Git, Jenkins, CodePipeline) in the process right from developer code check-in to Production deployment


TECHNICAL SKILLS:

DevOps Tools (example of tools):  Chef, Ansible, Docker or other

Cloud Platform:  Amazon Web Services (AWS) or cloud experience with other cloud/PaaS, like: Azure, GCP, OpenStack, etc.

Scripting Languages:   Python, Shell Programming nice to have: PERL, Ruby

Web/App Servers (examples):  Web logic, Web Sphere, Apache Tomcat, JBOSS

Build & CI Tools (examples):  ANT, Maven, Hudson/Jenkins, Nexus

SCM Tools (examples):  CVS, SVN, ClearCase, GitHub, Perforce

Operating Systems:  UNIX, Linux, Windows

Accenture does not discriminate based on race, religion, color, sex, age, disability, nationality, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or for any other reason covered by local law

INTERESADOS POSTULARSE POR ESTE MEDIO O ENVIAR SU CV ACTUALIZADO AL CORREO ADJUNTO

FACTUM IT

 

Empresa española de servicios de seguridad y comunicaciones. El alto conocimiento técnico de nuestros empleados es el principal valor de nuestra compañía. Estamos presentes en grandes clientes del ámbito español y trabajamos también en proyectos internacionales en Latinoamérica y Europa.

 

SOLICITAMOS EL SIGUIENTE PERFIL:

 

SCRUM Master.

 

Requisitos:

-        Lic. Informática o Afín

-        Experiencia al menos 3 años implementando metodología SCRUM en proyectos de desarrollo de aplicaciones e Infraestructura.

-       Experiencia en proyectos de Biométricos.

-        Haya gestionado Equipos de trabajo bajo metodología SCRUM

-        Cuente con Certificado SCRUM Master

 

Ofrecemos:

 

-        Sueldo competitivo

-        Prestaciones de Ley y Superiores

-        Estabilidad Laboral

 

Interesados, postularse por este medio

Consultor de Transformación Digital

 

 

ACTIVIDADES

Ø   - Formar y organizar equipos de trabajo para implementación de proyectos.

Ø    - Diseño de arquitectura de soluciones para proyectos de Big Data y Analítica (Hadoop/Cloudera/Hortonworks/ELK, etc.), realidad aumentada, optimización de procesos y soluciones core para diversos sectores.

Ø    - Generar requerimientos para su construcción y pruebas.

Ø    - Implementar soluciones, desarrollar componentes tecnológicos y hacer pruebas de funcionalidad.

 

FORMACIÓN:

-Licenciatura o Ingeniería en Computación, Sistemas, Tecnología de la Información o afín (Titulado)

 

EXPERIENCIA:


-3 años en proyectos de tecnología.

Ø   -  2 años liderando la implementación e integración de sistemas informáticos.

Ø   -  Identificación de requerimientos.

Ø   - Desarrollo de soluciones tecnológicas.

Ø   - Arquitectura de soluciones.

Ø   - Gestionando y administrando equipos de trabajo.

 

CONOCIMIENTOS:

 

-Lenguaje Java

-.NET

-Sistemas operativos y bases de datos

-Desarrollo movil de integración de APIs

-Realidad aumentada Smart Glasses

-Tecnología Big Data y Analítica

-Patrones de diseño y arquitectura de software

-Tecnología(s) disruptiva(s). Por ejemplo, Realidad Virtual/Aumentada, RPA, IOT, Mobile y Cloud Computing

A Place For You

 

Bring your talent to a global consulting and technology company, with presence in the 5 continents and more than 40,000 professionals. You will work in an environment of innovative solutions and services for our clients in the main sectors of activity, providing them with added value. You will participate in the transformation of the business by working with professionals of reference.    

 

We are looking for a CMDB Manager (Configuration Management DataBase)  

Schedule: Office hours and guards

Language Skills: Advanced English / Spanish (daily repport to USA)

Location: Teleworking

 

Role & Responsabilities:

- Responsible for planning, monitoring and verifying that the assets in the Asset Database match the CIs controlled in the CMDB and managing the maintenance of the asset record.

- Maintain accurate and up-to-date information on configuration elements (CI’s), as well as information on the relationships between them for the provision of services.

- Carry out and execute the Service Asset Configuration Plan where the CIs that will be followed up are identified and defined, depending on the service (s) that will be registered.

- Analyze the service documentation that was developed, designed and built in the previous stages of the service life cycle (Strategy and Design).

- Fully identify the IT configuration to allow effective control, recording and reporting of the CIs.

- Responsible for supporting the activities of infrastructure changes and application changes.

- Responsible for a properly accomplished of processes and company methodology.

 

Technical Skills:

- Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.

- Extensive experience in CMDB, ServiceNow, hardware and software asset and configuration management processes.

- Intermediate level knowledge of the ITIL service management life cycle.

- Experience in managing CI or the Configuration Process.

- Ability to perform CMDB analysis at a physical and logical level.

- High capacity for communication and interrelation with different work teams.

- Advanced knowledge of the ITIL service management life cycle.

- Advanced level in the management of management tools and Office.

- Knowledge of web infrastructures, cloud computing and virtualization.

- Knowledge of operating systems (windows server / linux / unix).

- Knowledge of Microsoft SQL, Oracle, DB2 databases, etc.

- Knowledge of Networks, Firewall, proxy, connection filtering, packet analysis, attack detection, etc.

- Desirable certification ITIL intermediate V3 or Itil Fundamentals V4.

- Audit knowledge.

- Language: English (Advanced).

- 5+ years of experience in the functions described.

 

Business Skills:

-IT Methodologies and Processes.

-Metrics Analysis.

-Business Continuity Process.

 

Benefits:

100% Payroll and benefits higher than those of the law.

 

At Indra you will have a professional career that is adapted to your personal goals, with continuous training and in a flexible environment. You will participate in international projects, with multicultural or local teams, according to your preferences, in a diverse environment and with equal opportunities. You will enjoy numerous social benefits and an interesting compensation package, while growing in an innovative environment.

We have job opportunities for:

SAP BODS application support 

Required skills: 

We are looking for an SAP BODS consultant experienced in application support at level 3 with the below must have skills:
Should have 4-5 years of Business Objects Data Services experience.
Should have strong experience in working with complex BODS Jobs where multiple Joins/transforms/Data Flows are involved.
Should have strong experience working on Job development by using all the Transforms, Custom Functions, File Formats.
Should have good knowledge on Variables, Parameters and its differences.
Advanced English level

Location: CDMX, GDL or MTY

We offer:

Great work environment & growth opportunities
Direct 100% payroll contract
Awesome employee benefits
 
Don't wait any longer and apply! Send your resume to the referred email address and we will call you.

Requirements
  • Proven and proficient experience using Ruby on Rails
  • Experience estimating backlogs and helping clients determine the best order for dependencies and features
  • Confidence in HTML structure and foundational CSS knowledge
  • Proficient in unit testing
  • Proficiency in API design and best practices
  • Working knowledge of GraphQL
  • Proficient in version control workflow and best practices with git

  • An understanding of web design and inherent tradeoffs
  • Experience with code review and pairing with other developers as needed
